column2: an A.M. Eatery////We also got the peanut butter cup pancake. Wow
column3: so creamy! I've never really had pancakes without syrup before
column4: but this one didn't need it. For some reason I was expecting it to taste more like Reese's peanut butter cup
column5: but I would say it just taste more like creamy peanut butter. I still really enjoyed it while it fell a bit flat for my husband. So I'd say don't knock it until you try it! Can't wait to come back and try other menu items now!
